fr.opensagres.maven.plugins
Class UploadDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  fr.opensagres.maven.plugins.UploadDescriptor

public class UploadDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

An UploadDescriptor describes an upload to be performed by the gcupload goal. It implements maven's convention over configuration paradigm by automatically deducing default values for properties based on the project properties.

Author:
Sebastian Riedel, Pascal Leclercq

getId

id of this upload (classifier or blank).

getClassifier

public java.lang.String getClassifier()
Returns the classifier that the target files have appended to their prefix. For example, if the prefix is "gcupload-maven-plugin-0.9" and the classifier is "jar-with-dependencies" then the filename without extension will be "gcupload-maven-plugin-0.9-jar-with-dependencies". If the classifier is the empty string the hyphen will not be added.

Returns:
the classifier of this upload.

getSummary

public java.lang.String getSummary()
Returns the summary of this upload to be added to the file in google code. If no summary has been specified this is deduced "description" tag of the project.

Returns:
the summary of the upload.
